summary: Real-estate style website to be built, including a property-listing system (with video support) and admin capabilities for inline editing of page text on Home, Properties, and Inquiries pages.
known_issues: Users encounter a 'Failed to create property' error when attempting to list a property; user also reports inability to add video to a property listing.

existing_features.title: Fix the “Failed to create property” flow so users see the real underlying reason (e.g., not an admin, request too large, invalid input), and ensure the UI guides the user to resolve it.

Make video attachment for property listings work end-to-end by supporting YouTube URLs reliably and preventing video uploads that exceed Internet Computer request limits, with clear user-facing validation and messaging.
Ensure property CRUD is usable by admins out of the box by making the initial admin bootstrap path clear and functional, so authorized users can create listings without hitting authorization traps.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin role can inline-edit any text on the Home, Properties, and Inquiries pages
Build property-listing system on the website, including support for adding/uploading video to listings

projectName: Fix property creation failures and make video support reliable for property listings
